MovieLookup.Description:
Looks performs a search on TheMovieDB.org.
Stores the Metadata inside the parameter 'MovieInfo'.

Outputs 1: Movie found
Outputs 2: Movie not found

Fields.UseFolderName-Help: If the folder name should be used instead of the filename.

MovieRenamer.Description:
Renames the working file using the metadata stored in 'MovieInfo'.
Note: MovieLookup should be executed in the flow before this node to work.

Output 1: File was renamed
Output 2: File failed to be renamed

Fields.Pattern-Help: The pattern to use to rename the folder.  '{Title}', '{Year}', '{Extension}'.
Fields.DestinationPath-Help: If the file should be moved to a different directory.
Fields.LogOnly-Help: Turn on if you just want to test this node without it actually renaming the file
